segments.text: Hi there . Welcome to Lincoln Corporate Services . How can we help ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hi . I was wondering what kind of fixed asset loans you have ? Do you have Fixed Asset Loans ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , we do . You'll go through the acceptance application , then a first review , then an evaluation and examination and finally get approval . Why don't you read through this brochure ? It outlines all of the important aspects of the loan , the terms and conditions , etc .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's a good idea , to familiarise myself with it . Then , I'll be back if we decide to go ahead .
segments.speaker: S2
